Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-39684 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-39684 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ceph is earlier than 16.2.10-5, affected by CVE-2024-39684
